snippet.title: TS4 Extreme Violence -MOD- V 2.3 Trailer
snippet.description:
Brutalities!
-Murder sims in 8 new ways, including running someone over with a car, blowing them up with a helicopter & moves inspired by iconic wrestling finishers!
-Hold sims at gunpoint and have sims shower you with money to spare their lives or spray all sims with a UZI while drifting in a car.
-Start a murder holiday and watch the whole town kill each other for a day. *Requires Seasons Expansion Pack but for this feature only*

Get this version from here:
https://www.sacrificialmods.com/downloads.html

Read release notes here:
http://www.sacrificialmods.com/extreme-violence-news.html

-Follow me on twitter for the latest mod news, updates & releases:
https://twitter.com/SacrificialMods

-Support me On Patreon:
https://www.patreon.com/SACRIFICIAL
